Welcome to FuelSpot! FuelSpot is the platform which you can track gas prices, recent news in addition to vehicle track (average consumption, emission…) and many more! Account created. We need location permission to showing nearest stations! Continue Do you have a car? Yes No / I will add it later By adding your vehicle into FuelSpot, you will get 1% for every fuel intake! You can spend your bonus on FuelSpot Store.\n\nThis campaign is only valid for personal vehicles and motorcycles. Retail purchases are not eligible for this campaign. Brand Model Primary fuel type NO Gasoline Diesel LPG Distance Electricity 2nd Gasoline 2nd Diesel Secondary fuel type If you don\'t have secondary fuel system, select NO Kilometer Plate no Got it! Please try again later… Location info fetching… Permission denied… Location services is not enabled. Please turn your location services on and try again…
Stations Latest Vehicle Profile Settings Pick the distributors you want to see and filter unwanted stations! Remove all filters to show all stations. By filtering facilities, you can find whatever you need easily.

Latest transactions You can see your latest transactions (including bonus/rewards and purchases, excluding subscriptions) on FuelSpot. If you want to manage your subscriptions (2xRange & Premium), you can check them on Google Play application. Current balance Premium version 2x-Range + No-Ads + Unlimited Street View + Unlimited Favorite Station + Unlimited Station Search \n\n The first 3 days are free! Start subscription 2x-Range It doubles your range. (6000 meters) Buy Reward Your balance is insufficient Active Purchase successful. You\'re switching to the premium version, thanks! Purchase successful. Your range is increasing, thanks! Purchase failed. Please try again later. Bonus: Get 1% bonus for every fuel adding! \n\n Reward: You will receive reward when you report station info/missing station. \n\n Purchase: Indicates your purchases over Store Legend Subscriptions Process type Date Products Purchasing Purchase successful! Average delivery time is 5 business day. Car Smell 3 FuelSpot Car Smell 8.99 FP! 5 FuelSpot Car Smell 13.99 FP! 10 FuelSpot Car Smell 24.99 FP! Please check your info before proceeding order. FuelSpot does not take responsibility for missing deliveries because of incorrect address/receiver information. You will have FP after purchase. Do you confirm purchase? Address is missing. Please add address information from Profile Edit and try again. Phone number is missing. Please add address information from Profile Edit and try again. E-mail is missing. Please add address information from Profile Edit and try again. Full Name is missing. Please add address information from Profile Edit and try again. You need to unsubscribe 2x-Range before starting Premium subscription. You can manage your subscriptions on Google Play app.

Kilometer must be different than 0 Please enter how much fuel you received There is a problem with your internet connection. Please check it and try again later… Adding fuel… Fuel added successfully… The money you pay You will get FP bonus by adding bill photo! You are not at the station! You have to be at the station for adding purchase. Please enter the unit price of fuel.
Are you station owner/manager? Register FuelSpot now and access unlimited opportunity and tools for free! * More customer, More income * Campaigns, opportunities and free promotions * Free ads and promotions on digital platforms (Google, Yandex, Yahoo etc.) * Follow rival station prices instantly * Latest news from petroleum industry, price indexes, stats and analysis * Get your digital profile of station! Manage station just one tap on the phone. * Answer customer comments regularly and increase customer loyalty. You will reach hundreds of thousands automobile owners for free! More recognition, more customer! License no I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions. To complete registration process, you must be at your station. When you enter the station perimeter, this text will turn into green and station info will be fetched automatically. Personal info You are at station!
Your account is under approval. A representative will contact you as soon as possible. MyStation You can manage base station info (prices, facilities, address…) in here. You can see reviews for station by users and reply them in here. You can manage ongoing and past campaigns in here.

Inbox This conversation is ended. Please enter your message. You have a new message!
Station Search You can search stations anywhere inside Turkey. Your search query can contain province/district/neighborhood/street etc. Station Search is limited for 3 searchs per day. Enter a place name… Station Search is limited for 3 queries per day. If you want more, you can subscribe Premium version!
